Verify that contains() returns false for any object Expected results: 1. isEmpty() returns true 2. size() returns 0 3. contains() returns false

Add null element Expected results: 1. add() returns true 2. size() returns 1 3. contains() returns true for added element 4. null can be added and retrieved

IndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown for invalid indices
